MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Barrland Drive and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the underground electricity cable fault outside 19 Barrland Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15am on Saturday 19th December 2020
